snippet: A number of red wines from Long Island are good matches for steak, burgers and other foods and can be found for less than $20.
abstract: Howard G Goldberg Long Island Vines column recommends red wines from Long Island to complement summer barbecues (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: A number of red wines from Long Island are good matches for steak, burgers and other foods and can be found for less than $20.

headline.seo: Long Island Red Wines Suited for Barbecues
